title: My only hope for new WW
body: They still let you build em AP, that is so fun and tbh riot has a really bad habit of forcin champs into specific build paths with how they design em. For example, only makin their entire kit scale with AD, or ONLY AP. Havin a choice between AP and the typical bloodrazor WW diversifies em a bit. Even if it's not the most optimal, viable or favored way of playin em it's a cool choice to have.
